channel.title: Eblast on Francis Laguna-Driscoll - Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Eblast on Francis Laguna-Driscoll - Portfolio

item.title: Lorelli NYC
item.description: Production Designer January 2019 to March 2019 I recently worked for Lorelli NYC from January to March of this year. Lorelli NYC caters to luxury property management firms offering branding and advertising. I gained a lot of experience as a production designer, working on a team under an account manager. My knowledge in the Adobe Creative suite came in handy while working with the Lorelli team. I utilized my skills in layout skills editing digital-ads, e-blasts, and mailers.

item.title: WAM Partners E-Blasts
item.description: Mailchimp Campaigns I introduced a fresher but still elegant design scheme to our email campaigns. I also began to highlight the features of the luxury residences, such as architectural details and modern appliances, which resulted in increased response to our email campaigns.
